Aktivis Antikorupsi Nilai Pemilihan Dewas KPK Kental Unsur Politis
03 Nov 2019, 19:04 by Yulida Medistiara
Jakarta - Anggota Dewan Pengawas KPK akan dipilih langsung oleh Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi). Ketua Yayasan Lembaga Bantuan Hukum Indonesia (YLBHI), Asfinawati menyebut anggota Dewan Pengawas KPK adalah kepanjang tangan presiden.
"Begini, siapapun dia yang sangat jelas tadi saya katakan ada relasi kekuasaan antara dewan pengawas dengan Presiden, jadi sesungguhnya yang mengendalikan KPK ya presiden, karena orang yang dipilih bertanggung jawab kepada orang yang memilih," kata Asfina, di kantor ICW, Kalibata, Jakarta Selatan, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Asfina menuding pimpinan KPK bisa dikendalikan presiden karena juga melalui proses pansel yang anggotanya dipilih oleh Jokowi. Menurut Asfina, KPK saat ini sedang dikendalikan presiden dan bisa dinikmati partai pendukungnya.
"Dan artinya juga di level pimpinan KPK pun dia juga melalui proses dari presiden (pansel). Jadi sebetulnya KPK ini sedang di tangan presiden, presiden bisa mengendalikan KPK. Dan siapapun yang bisa masuk ke presiden juga bisa menikmati relasi kekuasaan itu dengan KPK, termasuk partai partai pendukung," katanya.
Asfina menilai penunjukan anggota Dewan Pengawas kental dengan unsur politis. Sebab, kewenangannya lebih tinggi dari pada pimpinan KPK dan dinilai dapat melemahkan KPK, salah satunya penyadapan harus melalui izin Dewan Pengawas.
Selain itu, anggota Dewan Pengawas akan ditunjuk pertama kali oleh presiden, lalu baru dipilih melalui pansel pada saat masa pimpinan KPK selanjutnya. Menurut Asfina, Dewan Pengawas mestinya hanya mengawasi saja, seharusnya tidak memiliki kewenangan yang berlebih.
"Dewan pengawas ini sangat politis, jelas sekali karena ada pengaturan di tahun pertama ada berbeda dengan pemilihan berikutnya. Terus semua orang yang mengerti bahwa pengawas itu ya namanya mengawasi bukan menjalankan, kalau sekarang kan dia mengimplementasi," ujarnya.
Sebelumnya, Presiden Jokowi menyatakan masih menampung masukan-masukan pembentukan dewan pengawas KPK. Sesuai aturan yang ada, dewan pengawas dipilih langsung oleh Jokowi. Nantinya anggota Dewas akan dilantik pada Desember bersama Pimpinan KPK yang baru.
"Untuk pertama kalinya tidak lewat pansel, tapi percayalah nanti yang terpilih beliau-beliau yang memiliki kredibilitas yang baik," sebut Jokowi.
Seperti diketahui, dewan pengawas menjadi salah satu revisi dalam UU KPK yang baru. Dewan pengawas KPK ini dianggap dapat melemahkan penindakan di KPK.

Anti-Corruption Activists Value of Political Elementary Election Commission KPK Thick Political Elements
03 Nov 2019, 19:04 by Yulida Medistiara
Jakarta - Members of the KPK Supervisory Board will be directly elected by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi). Chairperson of the Indonesian Legal Aid Foundation (YLBHI), Asfinawati, said that members of the KPK Supervisory Board are the President's arms.
"Look, whoever is he who is very clear I said there is a power relationship between the supervisory board and the President, so in fact the one who controls the KPK is the president, because the person chosen is responsible to the person who chooses," said Asfina, at the ICW office, Kalibata, Jakarta South, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Asfina accused the KPK leadership of being able to be controlled by the president because it also went through a selection process whose members were chosen by Jokowi. According to Asfina, the KPK is currently being controlled by the president and can be enjoyed by his supporting parties.
"And it also means that at the level of the KPK leadership, he also went through the process of the president (pansel). So actually the KPK is in the hands of the president, the president can control the KPK. And anyone who can enter the president can also enjoy the power relations with the KPK, including parties supporting parties, "he said.
Asfina assessed that the appointment of members of the Supervisory Board is thick with political elements. Because, its authority is higher than the leadership of the KPK and is considered to be able to weaken the KPK, one of which is that wiretapping must go through the Supervisory Board's permission.
In addition, members of the Supervisory Board will be appointed first by the president, then only elected through a committee during the next KPK leadership. According to Asfina, the Supervisory Board should only supervise, it should not have excessive authority.
"This supervisory board is very political, obviously because there are regulations in the first year there are different from the next election. Then everyone who understands that the supervisor is monitoring is not running, if he now implements it," he said.
Previously, President Jokowi stated that he still accommodated inputs for the formation of the KPK supervisory board. In accordance with existing regulations, the supervisory board is directly elected by Jokowi. Later Dewas members will be appointed in December with the new KPK leadership.
"For the first time, it was not through the selection committee, but believe that later, he would be chosen with good credibility," Jokowi said.
As is known, the supervisory board is one of the revisions in the new KPK Law. The KPK supervisory board is considered to be able to weaken prosecution in the KPK.
